website_summaries.verdict: The best choice if you're in the market for a small compost bin. Often on sale, too.
pros: Solid construction, easy to clean, leak resistant and odor free
cons: Relatively on the small side in terms of capacity

customer_reviews.title: hole in side, less than 3 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this, except, it developed a pinhole in the side. We neither noticed it upon unpacking nor for the next two months. This hole developed with less than 3 months of light household/kitchen use. It is cleaned upon emptying every 2 days or so, which includes filling with soapy water, and using a kitchen sponge to remove any film from the inside. The warranty is only for 30 days, for a $30 item.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this steel compost bin! Not only is it eye appealing on the kitchen counter with the brushed steel, it is heavy duty. The built in filter in the lid works wonderfully, I use this to dump my used coffee grounds and the only time I smell them is when I open the bin to dump more. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compost scraps, not your budget
customer_reviews.text: Got the stainless kitchen compost bins few days ago and immediately began collecting scraps in it. No smell or leaks so far. The construction is excellent, the lid fits well so the occasional fruit fly we get around the cat's food bowl have not found a way in. No complaints, excellent deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alegria

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Classy, stylish, and functional! It looks great on the counter. I love that it has a mesh odor collector thing in the lid so I NEVER EVER smell the food. My complaint, which isn't really one is the stainless gets smudgy and dirty and it needs to be washed outside and definitely inside occasionally. Supposedly you can buy compostable bags, but that's another step and more to decompose that I'd rather not deal with.
customer_reviews.author: kbschmitz

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect compost bin for the counter-top
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect compost bin for the counter-top!!! I love the size - not too big, not too small. It looks nice with other stainless steel small appliances, such as coffeemaker, toaster oven, blender, etc. I use a lot of fresh produce in food preparation and all that I discard goes to the bin. At end of the day when I walk the dog I take the bin to the outdoor compost and voila- I have a clean bin without any odor or anything sticking to the walls. I could not find any better for my purposes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valeria C.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very pleased. I read a lot of reviews of similar products where the fit on the lid was so tight you had to be a wrestler to remove it. The lid on this fits exactly right. It also has enough room to allow me to use a biodegradable liner, which does not add to its attractiveness but makes it so much easier to clean out. (Coffee grounds get messy fast without a liner!) I have not noticed any odor yet - we'll see what happens when it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Connexus

customer_reviews.title: Works really well in our home. Have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in our home. Have been using the product for 9 months and still have yet to replace the filter. No smell comes from the can at all. My only suggestion to purchasers is to use compostable bags and change them out every other week. Otherwise it will begin to rust inside. Might want to wipe the excess residue out once you empty to can. Other than that small thing it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Squeekloud

customer_reviews.title: super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed it to be -- a small, compact counter-top compost bin. The picture online made it seem as though the metal was going to be a more "gun-metal" gray, but it arrived a standard stainless steel. Not a big issue, though! Charcoal filter in the lid to prevent smells, super easy to clean, definitely less of an eyesore than the bowl I had on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to replace a paint bucket with this lovely container. We are serious composers and this works well. It’s gets washed daily so it doesn’t smell. The food might but the can does not.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: just a really nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much nicer than other products that cost more. The lid fits tightly, but isn't hard to open and close. It's bigger than others too, so you can fit a lot more in at once. Overall, just a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buchman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the bin that was given to us when we started the compost program with the city. This seals tight and I do not notice any odor. Also, very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Compost Canister
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. The charcoal filter eliminates all oder and the unit is very attractive and just the right size for the kitchen counter. All at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Composting can be sleek and sexy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compost bin. It replaced a plastic Tupperware that we were using for food scraps. The stainless steel compost bin looks good on the counter, doesn’t stink, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Zacharewicz

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we needed because we can go for days before having to go to our outdoor compost and no stink. The filters work great...would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Innovative home stainless compost bin
customer_reviews.text: It looks sleek and modern! It looks great on my kitchen. And great price! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: We looked forever for a nice small container for compost. This is a perfect size, matches our stainless appliances, and there is no smell. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hardig

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. No odor.
customer_reviews.text: Use every day. No odor escapes even with onion & garlic scraps in the container for over a week. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lyanna

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Sturdy handle! Looks great with the staimless appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on the counter and keeps the smell contained for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for holding inside compost materials! Looks nice on the counter and keeps the smell contained for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for awhile now and we love it
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking compost container
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on the counter and works great for my used coffee grounds and other kitchen scraps. Never notice any bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this counter top compost container. It was a little bigger than I expected, however it holds alot and there is no odor. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works great. Big enough. Cannot smell a thing.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put a small baggie into keep it clean, so it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Great look. So far so good... Not yet fruit fly season though, so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No odor at all in my kitchen while this is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, arrived perfect, will meet my under-the-sink compost needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully discreet
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but doesn't matter, probably better...means less trips outside right?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this is great. hasn't scratched and keeps any odors sealed tight
customer_reviews.author: TTHolmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and good size for my family. No smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compost container
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Love it. Holds enough but small enough to fit under counter.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for some time and love it. We put our vegetable scraps in it for composting and it rinses out easily and washes well. It also eliminates fruit flies and odors. I attempted to order another one but was not able to purchase one. I will get another when they become available as it will be a great gift for a friend that likes to compost.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for composters and won't smell up the house
customer_reviews.text: This has been a welcome addition to our kitchen. We began composting this year for our garden and have been very pleased with this Compost Bin. The filters work great to prevent foul odors from leaking out and the stainless steel blends into our kitchen and is easy to clean. The one star deduction is due to the way the handle is screwed in. We have somehow managed to lose one of the screwed into the compost which makes me think a type of spot weld would have been better suited.
customer_reviews.author: Primetitis

customer_reviews.title: Size and material is great. Charcoal filter is very hard to clean and ...
customer_reviews.text: Size and material is great. Charcoal filter is very hard to clean and extremely hard to put back in place yet can can't be used without filters. If replacements are sold you will need new ones every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love large capacity and snug fitting lid which should be ...
customer_reviews.text: In use for 2 days. Love large capacity and snug fitting lid which should be deterrent to fruit flies. However, snug fitting lid means you must have 2 hands free to open container.
customer_reviews.author: Portland, Oregon

customer_reviews.title: looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: bought it to store coffee grounds til I take out to yard, no odors noted, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: stephen w herring

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: It has developed rust spots all over. Stainless steel should not rust. I am very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Quin

customer_reviews.title: holds more than i expected and no bugs get in/smells ...
customer_reviews.text: holds more than i expected and no bugs get in/smells get out... even when i leave it on the counter too long before dumping it.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice countertop compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, good looking compost holder, and I'm not noticing any odors.
customer_reviews.author: JGal

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen compost bin!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and workmanship. Looks great on the counter and perfect size that I do not have to run out to big compost bin everyday. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great Price!  Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great Price! Works Great! No Smell! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: NH3MAN

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had it long enough for some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough for some of the negatives others have found to have popped up, but so far it looks to be a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice container to catch composting scraps in the kitchen. It doesn't look out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for kitchen scraps. My wife uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: bill west

customer_reviews.title: No more odor from onion peel, etc. We ...
customer_reviews.text: No more odor from onion peel, etc. We always had to go outside in the winter to place our compost in a bucket on the porch. This odor free little container sits in our pantry ready for use. There was no info in our package so I had to look up charcoal filters to see how long they lasted between changes. Size and finish are all just what I was needing. Not regretting this purchase
customer_reviews.author: mapleleaf

customer_reviews.title: I like its large capacity and heavy lid which is easily ...
customer_reviews.text: It sure is more deluxe than the St. Vinny's plastic ice buckets I've been using for the past few years (at a fraction of the cost). I'm hoping the stainless steel will be easier to clean and won't degrade over time, plus the handle is heavy duty and hopefully won't break any time soon. I like its large capacity and heavy lid which is easily lifted off. This item arrived in super fast time and is as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jilliancd

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I hoped - Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I live where recycling is required. The countertop plastic bins provided by the city did not have tight fitting lids. Fruit flies year round both a bother and hard to eradicate. I have used this for a month and not a single fruit fly!!!! The lid is a 1 hand operation so very easy to use. Not to mention, the canister is unintrusive on my counter top. Will think of this as a gift going forward as I am a Realtor and it'll be a nice extra for my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M

product_meta.title: Innovative Home Stainless Steel Compost Bin Can with Double Filtered Lid, 1.3 Gallon
product_meta.description: Living green is easy with the Innovative Homegoods Compost Bin. Our design is an ideal solution for collecting and keeping kitchen scraps, daily or weekly, before transferring them to your outdoor compost pile. Our compost bin allows you to let those stinky scraps build up, without worrying about smelly odors or attracting pests. Constructed in durable stainless steel, our design is durable, stylish, rust and stain resistant. It wont scratch, crack, or chip. And with the thick activated charcoal filter, on the inside of the lid, smells are absorbed and trapped inside the bin, leaving your kitchen smelling fresh and clean. It is perfect for fruit peelings, vegetable scraps, and more. Dont wait, purchase your own Innovative Homegoods Compost Bin NOW.
feature_bullets: ECO-FRIENDLY - Living green is easy with the Innovative Homegoods Compost Bin. Composting is the most effective ecological way to convert kitchen waste into nutrient-rich compost for your plants and garden. Our composting bin is an ideal solution for collecting and keeping kitchen scraps, before transferring them to your outdoor compost pile.

DURABLE, STYLISH and DISCREET - Our design is made of premium stainless steel, and it wont scratch, crack, or chip. It will never pass any toxic chemicals into your compost, like other plastic bins. It will fit perfectly on the counter, under the sink, or in the pantry. Its the perfect size. It is designed to look sleek and blend well with any kitchen decor.

RUST AND STAIN RESISTANT - The Innovative Homegoods Compost Bin has smooth interior walls that prevent foods and liquids from sticking to or building up. It is rust-resistant and stain-resistant, making it long-lasting, and easy to clean.

COMPLETELY ODOR RESISTANT - Keep smelly odors from stinking up your kitchen. The thick activated charcoal filter on the inside of the lid absorbs and traps odors inside the bin, leaving your kitchen smelling fresh and clean. It is perfect for fruit peelings, vegetable scraps, and more.
QUALITY ASSURANCE - We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day guarantee. If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.
